title: Proofreading & editing skills: grammar and punctuation. Vol.2
brief_description: Led by Debra Smith and Helen Sutton, this seminar presentation video aims at teaching how to achieving total accuracy in written communication. This volume concentrates on: a basic review of sentence structure; how to fix run-on sentences; subject/verb agreement rules; noun/pronoun agreement rules; who vs. whom, me vs. myself; essential rules for using commas; use of semicolons; dashes and parentheses; and when to use quotations.
